main event: A high school student observed a white star-like object with occasional red flashes in Sioux Falls on 15 August 1966.
interesting points: The object had a bright appearance that increased and decreased every two seconds,The object moved in a zig-zag manner toward the northeast,It was visible for about 10 to 15 minutes,The observer used a telescope and binoculars to view the object,The sighting was reported to the Air Force.
sighted object: white star-like object with red flashes
